oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhihi Risālah fī al-ijāzah / lil-Imām al-Ḥāfiẓ al-Awḥad al-Mutqin Abū al-Muẓaffar Manṣūr ibn Salīm al-Hamadānī al-Iskandarī al-Shāfiʻī : manuscript, 1865 or 6
Risālah fī al-ijāzah
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ibn al-ʻImādīyah, Manṣūr ibn Salīm , 1210-1275
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 9 lines per page, in black and red.
According to the colophon (f. 12v), copy completed in 1282 AH [1865 or 6 AD].
With this is bound: Sharḥ Ṣalāt Ibn Mashīsh / Muṣṭafá al-Bakrī (ff. 14r-30r).
Title not mentioned in Brockelmann, S, I, 573.
MS Arab SM4326. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Hadith--Study and teaching
Transmission of texts
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: رسالة في الاجازة
